properties.displayName: User Login from Different Countries Within 3 Hours
properties.description: Detects successful user logins from different countries within 3 hours, where at least one state hasn't been logged in from before in the last 2 weeks.
properties.query:
let timeframe = ago(3h);
let threshold = 2;
let alerttable =
    SigninLogs
    | where ResultType == 0
    | where TimeGenerated > timeframe
    | summarize
        StartTime = min(TimeGenerated),
        EndTime = max(TimeGenerated),
        Countries = make_set(Location)
        by UserPrincipalName
    | extend NumOfCountries = array_length(Countries)
    | where NumOfCountries >= threshold;
let LocationDetails = SigninLogs
    | where ResultType == 0
    | where TimeGenerated > timeframe
    | where isnotempty( LocationDetails.state)
    | join kind=inner alerttable on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UserPrincipalName
    | extend LocationDetail = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
    | summarize
        Applications = make_set(AppDisplayName),
        AuthenticationType = make_set(AuthenticationRequirement),
        Device = make_set(DeviceDetail),
        RiskEvent= make_set(RiskEventTypes),
        RiskEventV2 = make_set(RiskEventTypes_V2)
        by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, LocationDetail, Location;
let IPManagedAttempts = SigninLogs
    | union AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where (tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_dynamic).trustType) != "" or tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_string).trustType) != "") or (DeviceDetail_dynamic or DeviceDetail_string contains "PII Removed")
    | distinct IPAddress;
let KnownLocations = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. ago(3h))
    | where isnotempty(Location)
    | where isnotempty(LocationDetails.state)
    | where ResultType == 0
    | summarize UserKnownLocations = make_set(Location), UserKnownStates = make_set(LocationDetails.state) by UserPrincipalName;
alerttable
| join kind=inner LocationDetails on UserPrincipalName
| join kind=leftouter KnownLocations on UserPrincipalName
| project-reorder
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    UserPrincipalName,
    NumOfCountries,
    Countries,
    Location,
    LocationDetail,
    UserKnownLocations,
    UserKnownStates,
    IPAddress,
    Applications,
    AuthenticationType,
    Device,
    RiskEvent,
    RiskEventV2
| project-away UserPrincipalName1,UserPrincipalName2
| where (UserKnownLocations has Location) and (UserKnownStates !has LocationDetail)
| join kind=leftanti IPManagedAttempts on IPAddress
